channel.title: Projects on Michael Abadi's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Michael Abadi's Blog

item.title: Smart Trip
item.description: Explore tourism nearby, buy e-ticket and enjoy your trip. This project as part of DevPost hackathon about APEC 2021 App Challenge Tech Stack Combine Core Data Firebase SwiftUI Demo

item.title: Tripzy
item.description: Personalised your travel budgets, easily directly from pocket without any hassle. Tech Stack Combine Core Data SwiftUI Download https://apps.apple.com/th/app/tripzy/id1564625604

item.title: Englizh
item.description: Test your IELTS or English skills in general with this application. Tech Stack Combine Core Data SwiftUI Download

item.title: Stockpedia
item.description: See latest stock news and current company stock detail around the world. Tech Stack Combine Finnhub API SwiftUI Download https://apps.apple.com/th/app/stockpedia/id1550579452

item.title: Tripzy (Draft)
item.description: Personalised your travel itinerary, search another inspiration from people around the world, and easily import or bookmark trips. Tech Stack Combine Core Data SwiftUI Demo
